website_summaries.verdict: With Microsoft's better-designed Xbox 360 remote available for just a few dollars more, there's no reason to own the Nyko Intelligent Remote 360.
pros: This inexpensive remote has decent DVD and Xbox 360 dashboard navigation
cons: Programming this rather ugly remote is tedious, and the buttons aren't very responsive

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the gen 2 remote
customer_reviews.text: This remote is way better than the "new and improved" one from microsoft. It has a stop button, and an open and close button that if you never had may not miss, but since this was my old remote that finally stopped fully functioning after 10 years I opted to get the same one again. Plus the backlight is another missed feature from the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Pain in neck Remote
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work very well. Easy to program? yes. You cant move too fast for it. You have to wait for the lights to go out before you try another button. It's just really annoying. TOTALLY not worth the money. I only use it to turn the game unit off after watching a movie so i dont have to turn the controller back on to turn it off. Dont get it.
customer_reviews.author: L. McEwen

customer_reviews.title: Good 360 remote, don't count on learning to work
customer_reviews.text: Solid 360 remote, won't learn volume down button on my remote so useless as universal remote for me. Have to give 4 stars for being worth what I spent on it. Learning is a hit or miss and only the lower half is learnable, good bonus if all the buttons you need work with it.

customer_reviews.title: mediocre controller
customer_reviews.text: Most universal remotes have codes you can enter that will automatically configure your remote to work with your device. This remote suggests that you program each button individually. While very time-consuming, the product works great. If you don't have the extra few minutes to spend, go with one of the better brands.

product_meta.title: Xbox 360 Intelligent Remote
product_meta.description: Never be burdened with programming remotes again! The Intelligent Remote 360 is a self programming remote for the Xbox 360 that learns the functions for other remotes. Simply select the function on the remote that you would like the Intelligent Remote to learn, point the remotes toward each other, and with the press of a button the data is transferred instantly.
feature_bullets: Self-programming remote controls for Xbox 360, TV and stereo
Built-in smart function - learns from existing remotes, no codes or software included
